nodes.text: Poli Dapatian was a male Jedi Master who sat on the Jedi High Council at some point before the Invasion of Naboo. During his time on the Council, Dapatian took on an apprentice that had been one of Qui-Gon Jinn's crèche-mates. He was present at some point when Master Eno Cordova and his Padawan, Cere Junda, were assigned to investigate a Temple on Ontotho. In 40 BBY, Dapatian announced that he intended to retire from the Council in a month's time and his place on the Council was offered to Jinn, who requested time to meditate on the offer. He breathed with the aid of a respirator mask. He was considered highly renowned, but became very aged in appearance in his later years.
Poli Dapatian first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray. He was first pictured in Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple 1, a comic released on September 4, 2019.
